<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>eun</catalog>
            <entry>14419</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="it">Esplorando l' Europa</string>
            <string language="en">Exploring Europe</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Erforschendes Europa</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">l'Europe L'explorant</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Europa Explorando</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εξερεύνηση της Ευρώπης</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Europa Que explora</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <language>de</language>
          <description>
            <string language="it">Gli studenti possono studiare l'organizzazione Europea, la UE, i paesi candidati ed anche gli stati che non sono membri della UE.</string>
            <string language="en">Students can study European Organizations, the EU, the candidate countries and also the non-member states.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kursteilnehmer können europäische 
Organisationen, das EU, die Bewerberländer und auch die Nichtmitglied
Zustände studieren.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les étudiants peuvent étudier les organismes 
européens, l'EU, les pays de candidat et également les états de non
élément de circuit.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os estudantes podem estudar organizações 
européias, o EU, os países do candidato e também os estados do 
non-member.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι σπουδαστές μπορούν να μελετήσουν τις ευρωπαϊκές 
οργανώσεις, την ΕΕ, τις χώρες υποψηφίων και επίσης τα κράτη μη 
μέλη.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los estudiantes pueden estudiar organizaciones 
europeas, el EU, los países del candidato y también los estados del 
no miembro.</string>
          </description>
        </general>

          <description>
            <string language="it">Per prima cosa far studiare agli allievi le varie parti dell'esercizio. Soltanto quando avranno preso in considerazione le spiegazioni, saranno in grado di risolvere la Webquest. Essi troveranno inoltre altri interessanti siti web nel Résumé.</string>
            <string language="en">Make the students first study the various parts of this exercise. Only when they have studied the explanations, will they be able to solve the Webquest. Furthermore they will find numerous additional interesting websites in the Résumé.</string>
          </description>
        </educational>
